channel.title: CVE Feed for oroinc -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for oroinc -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-45824|2024-08-22T17:57:06.788Z -- oroinc -- platform
item.description: OroPlatform is a PHP Business Application Platform (BAP). A logged in user can access page state data of pinned pages of other users by pageId hash. This vulnerability is fixed in 5.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-48296|2024-08-02T21:23:39.499Z -- oroinc -- orocommerce
item.description: OroPlatform is a PHP Business Application Platform (BAP). Navigation history, most viewed and favorite navigation items are returned to storefront user in JSON navigation response if ID of storefront user matches ID of back-office user. This vulnerability is fixed in 5.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-45824|2024-03-25T18:15:32.850Z -- oroinc -- platform
item.description: OroPlatform is a PHP Business Application Platform (BAP). A logged in user can access page state data of pinned pages of other users by pageId hash. This vulnerability is fixed in 5.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-48296|2024-06-04T17:27:34.578Z -- oroinc -- orocommerce
item.description: OroPlatform is a PHP Business Application Platform (BAP). Navigation history, most viewed and favorite navigation items are returned to storefront user in JSON navigation response if ID of storefront user matches ID of back-office user. This vulnerability is fixed in 5.1.4.
